title: Prohibits issuance of a license for the retail sale of alcoholic beverages for on-premises or off-premises consumption to any premises with a drive-through facility
summary: Prohibits the issuance of a license for the retail sale of alcoholic beverages for on-premises or off-premises consumption to any premises with a drive-up or drive-through facility.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3570

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 25, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. P. RIVERA, BARRON -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of
         A. CASTRO, CRESPO, CYMBROWITZ, DenDEKKER,  FINCH,  GABRYSZAK,  JAFFEE,
         MAGEE,  MARKEY, McDONOUGH, McENENY, McKEVITT, MILLMAN, NOLAN, PHEFFER,
         REILLY, N. RIVERA, ROBINSON, SALADINO, SCARBOROUGH,  SCHIMEL,  TITONE,
         WEISENBERG  --  read  once  and  referred to the Committee on Economic
         Development

       AN ACT to amend the alcoholic  beverage  control  law,  in  relation  to
         prohibiting  the  granting of a license for the retail sale of alcohol
         beverages for on-premises or off-premises consumption to any  premises
         upon which there exists a drive-up or drive-through facility

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 105  of  the  alcoholic  beverage  control  law  is
    2  amended by adding a new subdivision 4 to read as follows:
    3    4.  NO  RETAIL  LICENSE TO SELL ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES FOR ON-PREMISES OR
    4  OFF-PREMISES CONSUMPTION SHALL BE GRANTED FOR ANY  PREMISES  UPON  WHICH
    5  THERE EXISTS A DRIVE-UP OR DRIVE-THROUGH FACILITY.
    6    S  2.  This  act  shall  take  effect  immediately, and shall apply to
    7  licenses issued or renewed on or after such date.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01198-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to prohibiting the granting of a license for the retail sale of alcohol beverages for on-premises or off-premises consumption to any premises upon which there exists a drive-up or drive-through facility
